name: Mystma
description: Mystma is a mysterious pokemon found in dark and secluded environments. Its body is decorated with an array of ornate designs, hinting at its powerful psychic capabilities. It has an uncanny knack for sensing the presence of others, and can use its Phantom Beam ability to disorient or even neutralize opponents. When left to its own devices, Mystma can often be found deep in thought, likely pondering the secrets of its strange habitat.
image_prompt: Mystma::0 a simple psychic-type ladybug pokemon, in a cave environment, pink bokeh lighting, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
